color: light grey, white, red, blue, lime green, pink, purple
count: 2 dumbbells (4kg set), 3 pairs (6 dumbbells) for multi-pack
material: vinyl coated cast-iron (also referred to as neoprene coating)
usage: strength training, toning, aerobics, rehabilitation, home workouts, increasing muscle mass, burning calories, improving cardiovascular health, improving muscular endurance, increasing bone density
key_features: Hexagon shaped edges for easy storage and prevent rolling
Thick vinyl coating for comfortable and non-slip feel
Odor-free, color-stable coating that resists fading
Surface texture remains consistent in extreme temperatures
ai_description: The images show KAKSS hexagonal dumbbells with a smooth vinyl/neoprene coating in various vibrant colors including light grey, red, blue, lime green, pink, and purple. The dumbbells feature a hexagon shape that prevents rolling, with weight markings clearly printed on the ends. One promotional image displays three color-coded pairs (1kg green, 3kg red, 5kg blue) arranged around the brand logo, highlighting features like the cast-iron core and non-slip coating. A lifestyle shot shows a woman holding a purple dumbbell alongside health benefit claims.
target_audience: fitness enthusiasts of all levels, home gym users, rehabilitation patients
manual: Manufactured using REACH-compliant, non-toxic materials, these dumbbells feature an odor-free, color-stable coating that resists fading and wear over time. The carbon-free composition ensures a cleaner, safer finish, while the surface texture remains consistent and comfortable even under extreme hot or cold temperature conditions. Designed with a precision hex shape, the dumbbells offer enhanced ground stability and prevent rolling during floor-based exercises, making them safe, durable, and reliable for everyday training.
